introBegin: Over the last year, I have been working towards completing my masters degree in Embedded and Cyber Physical Systems. It's helped me understand how to build IoT solutions and the unique challenges involved in them. I am particularly interested in wireless sensor networks, and my research project focuses on MAC protocols for IoT networks.
introEnd: I have a strong foundation in Computer Science, experience with a number of different languages (C++, Java, Javascript), a good understanding of web development technologies, cloud platforms (AWS and Azure), IoT and a basic understanding of modeling cyber physical systems.
